article_title: Two Madison hospitals to pay penalties for patient infections, injuries
article_text:
Madison, WI (53711)

Today

Cloudy skies this morning followed by scattered showers and thunderstorms during the afternoon. High near 80F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%..

Tonight

Thunderstorms - some may contain locally heavy rain, especially this evening. Low 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , affordable care act, uw hospitals and clinics, meriter, st. mary's, patient care
article_metadata.author: Jessica VanEgeren| The Cap Times

og.description: Meriter and UW Hospitals and Clinics are on a preliminary list of 750 hospitals nationwide that will be penalized by Medicare.
